title: David Tepper believes Panthers are 'building something special in Carolina'
snippet: With a chance to see his Panthers turn in a winning season and earn a playoff berth for the first time since he became the team's majority owner in 2018, David Tepper is excited with what's happening in Charlotte, North Carolina.
